text: Laurence Murray Greig (born 24 February 1929) is a Scottish-born New Zealand lawyer and jurist. He was Chief Justice of the Cook Islands from 2000 to 2005. He was also a judge of the High Court of New Zealand, and Inspector-General of Intelligence and Security. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish lawyers Category:New Zealand lawyers
title: Laurence Greig
